DOC.brief_summary: Patients with partial-onset seizures seen in community-based practices were to be included in this therapeutic use study - to assess the safety and tolerability of Keppra (Levetiracetam) and to confirm the favorable safety of the drug found during clinical development - to obtain further information about optimal dosing in daily clinical practice. Compared to previous registration trials, the study population corresponded more closely to that seen in daily clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacovigilance Study of Keppra. SPAIN - SKATE : Safety of Keppra as Adjunctive Therapy in Epilepsy
DOC.criteria: Male and female older than 16 years; Epilepsy with partial onset seizures, with or without secondary generalization; At least one concomitant marketed antiepileptic drug Safety reasons
